intro: Mentzelia nesiotes, commonly known as the silverleaf blazingstar, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and showy yellow flowers that bloom in late spring. The plant typically grows in arid or semi-arid environments, such as sandy soils and rocky slopes. It belongs to the sunflower family (Asteraceae) and is known for its adaptability to harsh conditions. Mentzelia nesiotes plays a role in supporting local pollinators and is often found in desert ecosystems.
